null: You may submit your application for 1 of the following 2 types of courses by filling up the relevant segments in the Course Proposal Form (CP). Each course application is to be accompanied by 1 CP Form.
*WSQ Integrated course refers to a course application with more than 1 Technical Skills and Competencies
(TSC) but not leading to a full qualification.
For application of WSQ Full Qualification, please click here:
https://www.tpgateway.gov.sg/plan-courses/course-accreditation select “What do I need for the application? s/no b.”
Title: Create Engaging Social E-Commerce Campaigns on XiaoHongShu
LO1: Implement XiaoHongShu e-commerce campaigns in alignment to strategic marketing objectives.
LO2: Analyse XiaoHongShu campaign outcomes using sales performance data and consumer insights.
LO3: Analyse e-Commerce trends and customer review on XiaoHongShu’s Shop.
K3: Methods to advertise products online
K6: Means of using data gathered from pre-campaign testing
A1: Execute e-Commerce campaigns in alignment to e-Commerce strategies, sales and marketing strategies
A2: Monitor campaign performance and effectiveness in accordance with performance measures
A3: Analyse information on e-commerce sales and customer feedback
A4: Identify e-Commerce trends and patterns from campaign analysis
A5: Monitor social media platforms or online blog or vlog and forums related platforms for customer feedback or review
LU1: Introduction to E-Commerce Campaign: Topic 1: Setup E-Commerce Campaign Management with XiaoHongShu (K1, K2, A1)
Key elements of e-commerce campaign with XiaoHongShu (K1)
Communicating effectively on XiaoHongShu (Little Red Book)  (K2)
How to execute an effective e-commerce campaign on XiaoHongShu (Little Red Book) (A1)
LU2: Performance Monitoring and Analysis: Topic 2: Monitor and Analyze E-Commerce Performance (K3, K4, A2, A3)
List and advertise products online on XiaoHongShu (K3)
Advertising media options available on XiaoHongShu (K4)
LU3: Social Trends and Feedback Analysis: Topic 3: Analyze Social Trends and Customer Feedbacks  (K5, K6, A4, A5)
Decide your social e-Commerce campaign schedules (K5)
Analyze e-commerce trends and patterns from campaign analysis on XiaoHongShu (K6, A4)
